long_description: Built for adventure, the Afar daypack from Eagle Creek is designed for travel when any road to get there will do. Smart travel organization includes mobile phone and electronics pockets, zippered mesh pocket and pen slots. Lockable, padded laptop compartment fits most 17 in. laptops and has a hidden travel document slip pocket. Lockable, self-repairing zippers with finger-friendly zipper pulls on main compartment. Ergonomically contoured shoulder straps with an adjustable sternum strap and padded, tuck-away hipbelt provide a comfortable carry for any size load. Padded breathable mesh back panel enhances your comfort. Exterior compression straps contain load for easier carrying. Includes exterior front mesh zip pocket, 2 side mesh pockets and a top grab handle. Bike safety light attachment loop (light sold separately) and daisy chain. Eagle Creek Afar daypack has reflective accents for dusk and nighttime visibility.
short_description: Built for adventure, the Afar daypack from Eagle Creek is designed for travel when any road to get there will do.
